name: @bitwarden/desktop
description: A secure and free password manager for all of your devices.
author: Bitwarden Inc. <hello@bitwarden.com> (https://bitwarden.com)

scripts.build: concurrently -n Main,Rend,Prel -c yellow,cyan "pnpm run build:main" "pnpm run build:renderer" "pnpm run build:preload"
scripts.build:dev: concurrently -n Main,Rend,Prel -c yellow,cyan "pnpm run build:main:dev" "pnpm run build:renderer:dev" "pnpm run build:preload:dev"
scripts.build:main:dev: pnpm run build-native && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.js --config-name main
scripts.build:main:watch: pnpm run build-native && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.js --config-name main --watch
scripts.flatpak:dev: pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --dir -p never && flatpak-builder --force-clean --install --user ../../.flatpak/ ./resources/com.bitwarden.desktop.devel.yaml && flatpak run com.bitwarden.desktop
scripts.pack:lin: pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --linux --x64 -p never && export SNAP_FILE=$(realpath ./dist/bitwarden_*.snap) && unsquashfs -d ./dist/tmp-snap/ $SNAP_FILE && mkdir -p ./dist/tmp-snap/meta/polkit/ && cp ./resources/com.bitwarden.desktop.policy  ./dist/tmp-snap/meta/polkit/polkit.com.bitwarden.desktop.policy && rm $SNAP_FILE && snap pack --compression=lzo ./dist/tmp-snap/ && mv ./*.snap ./dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/tmp-snap/ && tar -czvf ./dist/bitwarden_desktop_x64.tar.gz -C ./dist/linux-unpacked/ .
scripts.pack:lin:arm64: pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --linux --arm64 -p never && export SNAP_FILE=$(realpath ./dist/bitwarden_*.snap) && unsquashfs -d ./dist/tmp-snap/ $SNAP_FILE && mkdir -p ./dist/tmp-snap/meta/polkit/ && cp ./resources/com.bitwarden.desktop.policy  ./dist/tmp-snap/meta/polkit/polkit.com.bitwarden.desktop.policy && rm $SNAP_FILE && snap pack --compression=lzo ./dist/tmp-snap/ && mv ./*.snap ./dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/tmp-snap/ && tar -czvf ./dist/bitwarden_desktop_arm64.tar.gz -C ./dist/linux-arm64-unpacked/ .
scripts.pack:mac:with-extension: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run build:macos-extension:mac && electron-builder --mac --universal -p never
scripts.pack:mac:mas: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run build:macos-extension:mas && electron-builder --mac mas --universal -p never
scripts.pack:mac:masdev: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run build:macos-extension:masdev && electron-builder --mac mas-dev --universal -p never
scripts.pack:local:mac: pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run build:macos-extension:masdev && electron-builder --mac mas-dev --universal -p never -c.mac.provisioningProfile="" -c.mas.provisioningProfile=""
scripts.pack:win: pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p never -c.win.signtoolOptions.certificateSubjectName="8bit Solutions LLC"
scripts.pack:win:beta: pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --config electron-builder.beta.json --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p never -c.win.signtoolOptions.certificateSubjectName="8bit Solutions LLC"
scripts.dist:dir: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:dir
scripts.dist:lin: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:lin
scripts.dist:lin:arm64: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:lin:arm64
scripts.dist:mac: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:mac
scripts.dist:mac:mas: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:mac:mas
scripts.dist:mac:masdev: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:mac:masdev
scripts.dist:win: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:win
scripts.dist:win:ci: pnpm run build && pnpm run pack:win:ci
scripts.publish:lin: pnpm run build && pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --linux --x64 -p always
scripts.publish:mac: pnpm run build && pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --mac -p always
scripts.publish:mac:mas: pnpm run dist:mac:mas && pnpm run upload:mas
scripts.publish:win: pnpm run build && pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p always -c.win.signtoolOptions.certificateSubjectName="8bit Solutions LLC"
scripts.publish:win:dev: pnpm run build:dev && pnpm run clean:dist && electron-builder --win --x64 --arm64 --ia32 -p always
